actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit the extension of credit to Turkey until the President reports to the Congress that Turkey is cooperating with the United States in the curtailment of heroin traffic.

summary.text: Prohibits the extension of credit to Turkey under the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 until the President reports to the Congress that Turkey is cooperating with the United States in the curtailment of heroin traffic.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit the extension of credit to Turkey until the President reports to the Congress that Turkey is cooperating with the United States in the curtailment of heroin traffic.
